scripts.start:backend: cd backend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:frontend: cd Shareup-frontend && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:mobile: cd mobile-app && npm install && npm start
scripts.start:all: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend & npm run start:mobile
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:fix: npm run lint:fix:backend && npm run lint:fix:frontend
